availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Asa P. Simpson (clerk of Russell Circuit Court)

body.p: Russell County Circuit Court clerk. Adair County, Kentucky native. Married to Sophia Lou Jones Simpson. Merchant in Russell County. Master Mason in Marrowbone Lodge. Served one term as Russell County Judge.

bibl.p:
Eight Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland, District 1, p. 69; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Russell, District 1, p. 14; Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Russell County, 1862;
The Adair County News, May 30, 1906, 3; Find A Grave, "Asa P. Simpson (1834-1906)," Memorial #83144920, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=83144920 (accessed May 25, 2017).
